description_zh: 访问系统剪贴板功能，进行复制和粘贴操作。
description_en: Access the system clipboard for copy and paste operations.

conditions.description_zh: 复制到剪贴板成功时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when a copy to the clipboard is successful.

conditions.description_zh: 复制到剪贴板失败时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when a copy to the clipboard fails.
Triggered on a successful paste of text.

conditions.description_zh: 成功粘贴二进制数据时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered on a successful paste of binary data.

actions.description_zh: 复制文本数据到剪贴板。注意：这可能会显示一个权限提示，需要用户授权通过才能继续执行。
actions.description_en: Copy some text to the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger.

actions.description_zh: 复制某些二进制数据到剪贴板。注意：这可能会显示一个权限提示，需要用户授权通过才能继续执行。
actions.description_en: Copy some binary data to the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger.

actions.description_zh: 请求从剪贴板中读取文本数据。注意：这可能会显示一个权限提示，需要用户授权通过才能继续执行。
actions.description_en: Request to read text from the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger and may show a permission prompt.

actions.description_zh: 请求从剪贴板中读取二进制数据。注意：这可能会显示一个权限提示，需要用户授权通过才能继续执行。
actions.description_en: Request to read binary data from the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger and may show a permission prompt.

expressions.description_zh: 触发 '粘贴文本' 动作后，从剪贴板中读取到的文本。
expressions.description_en: In 'On paste text', the text that was read from the clipboard.
